channel.title: RST on DevOps Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in RST on DevOps Engineer

item.title: Setting up Sphinx + ReadTheDocs from Scratch - Rapidly Deploying Automated Documentation
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: In open-source projects or team collaborations, Sphinx + ReadTheDocs provides an easy-to-maintain, automatically deployable documentation system. This article documents the configuration process and considerations.

item.title: Markdown — Not So Great Anymore? Why More and More Python Projects Use RST?
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: Markdown and reStructuredText (RST) are two commonly used markup languages. This article compares their advantages and disadvantages and shares usage suggestions in different scenarios.
